results.title: Nephrotic-range proteinuria in an infant with thin basement membrane nephropathy.
results.text_hl: He was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for 1.5 years, which resolved his @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hematuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006417 @@@hematuria@@@.

citations.NLM: Ishimori S, Kaito H, Hara S, Nakanishi K, Yoshikawa N, Iijima K. Nephrotic-range proteinuria in an infant with thin basement membrane nephropathy. CEN Case Rep. 2013 Nov;2(2):194-196. PMID: 28509291
